suncertify.fields
Class FieldDetails

java.lang.Object
  suncertify.fields.FieldDetails
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public final class FieldDetails
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Meta data for a field. This class contains

  • The field name
  • The type of the field
  • Whether the field should be included in the search form
  • Whether the field should be displayed in the search results table
  • Whether the field is modifiable by the user
  • The maximum length of the field, in characters
This class is immutable.

See Also:

Constructor Detail

FieldDetails

public FieldDetails(java.lang.String fieldName,
                    java.lang.Class<? extends Field> fieldClass,
                    boolean searchable,
                    boolean displayable,
                    boolean modifiable,
                    java.lang.Integer maxLength)
Create a new FieldDetails instance.

Parameters:
fieldName - the name of the field
fieldClass - the class of the field
searchable - true if clients should search on this field
displayable - true if clients should display this field in the search results
modifiable - true if the field can be modified
maxLength - the maximum string length for this field, or null if length is unbounded

Get the unlocalized name of the field.

Returns:
the field name

public java.lang.Class<? extends Field> getFieldClass()
Get the class of the field.

Returns:
the field class

isDisplayable

public boolean isDisplayable()
Determine if the field be displayed in the search results table.

Returns:
true if the field should be displayed

isSearchable

public boolean isSearchable()
Determine if the field be included in the search criteria.

Returns:
true if the field should be searchable

isModifiable

public boolean isModifiable()
Determine if this field is modifiable by the user.

Returns:
true if the field is modifiable

getMaxLength

public java.lang.Integer getMaxLength()
Get the maximum permittable string length for this field.

Returns:
the maximum field length, or null if length is unbounded

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Get a string describing the field details. The string contains:
  • the field name
  • the field class
  • whether the field is searchable
  • whether the field is displayable
  • whether the field is modifiable
  • the maximum length of the field (in characters)

Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object
Returns:
a string representation of the object
